subsection.name: Introduction
subsection.p: This plugin enables centralized management of all modules to do SEO (Search Engine Optimizations) sitemap, friendly URLs, canonical URLs, robots.txt, ...

subsection.name: Friendly URLs
subsection.p: The friendly URLs module lets you create nicer URL for any resource of your site.
can be accessible with a much more friendly URL

subsection.name: Sitemap
subsection.p: The Sitemap module lets you create and generate a Sitemap file that contains all the page of your site to do a better search indexing.

subsection.name: Robots.txt
subsection.p: The robot.txt module lets you manage the file that will indicate to bots how to navigate in your site

subsection.name: URL rewriting
subsection.p: The URL rewriting module lets you create rules to redirect automatically URL to another.
